description:
Señor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Señor`s tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry`s rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Duell zwischen Männern – Señor Pink und das Klagelied der Liebe
Le duel des hommes. L`élégie d`amour de Señor
Otoko no Kettou: Senor Ai no Banka
The Manly Duel! Senor`s Elegy of Love!
Мужской поединок. Элегия сеньора о любви
男の決闘 セニョール愛の挽歌
